hanzi-su-wiki:
総

Значения

Всё, целиком, полностью

Мнемоника

Сокращение. Сидя у окна 窓, где светлее, вязать нитки 糸 в пучки. Кисть, основной, всё.

Варианты

總, 总, 緫, 揔, 惣

Japanese variant of 总

rtega_mnemonic:
總總RS
总总		総捴摠總𢵃𢷝 揔惣collect, overall, altogether
  • bind things together with thread 糸 in an agitated 悤/忩 way or by hand 扌 and transported by cow 牜
  • ⓢ many things 丷 collected in the heart 心 are told by the mouth 口
  • cows and animals 物 are all the things dearest to the heart 心 of a farmer
heisig_constituent: general, thread, spiderman, public, eight, elbows, heart
heisig_story: This kanji, meaning universal or widespread, is composed of three elements: thread . . . public . . . heart.
koohiiStory1: Spiderman could not achieve general acceptance by the media even after winning the public´s heart.
koohiiStory2: General or universal refers to the common thread running through the public's heart.
jp_example_words:
総(そう): whole, all, general, gross
総会(そうかい): general meeting
総合(そうごう): synthesis, coordination, putting together, integration, composite
総理大臣(そうりだいじん): Prime Minister
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Taking out your thread, you sew together the public's hearts to make them whole again.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: The world has been in turmoil and the public has been suffering, but it's time to stop splitting our hearts apart and fighting. It's time to be whole again.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Once their hearts are whole, the public's soul (そう) becomes one!
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Suddenly people who were fighting for years are crying and holding one another. Their souls recognize each other, they're healed, and the whole nation is finally seeing eye to eye.
Ru_Radicals: ハ, 厶 (значок МУ), 小 (маленький), 幺 (короткая нить), 心 (сердце), 糸 (нить)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: an official (公) heart (心) needs thread (糸), in general

総字的基本解释

総
zǒng
古同“总”。

総字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zǒng］
［《字彙補》作孔切］
同“總1”。
按，亦为“總”的日本用简体汉字。
[②]［cōng］
［《字彙補》倉紅切］
(1)青黄色。
(2)绸绢。
(3)亦为“總”的日本用简体汉字。

総字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【糸字部】　総； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页929第24
【字彙補】同總。　又倉紅切，音蔥。色靑黃也。　又紬絹也。

Radicals: 糸, 公, 心  (thread, public, heart)
Meaning Mnemonic
Taking out your thread, you sew together the public's hearts to make them whole again.
The world has been in turmoil and the public has been suffering, but it's time to stop splitting our hearts apart and fighting. It's time to be whole again.
Reading Mnemonic
Once their hearts are whole, the public's soul (そう) becomes one!
Suddenly people who were fighting for years are crying and holding one another. Their souls recognize each other, they're healed, and the whole nation is finally seeing eye to eye.
